discover.instruction: Read about services people use. Notice who does the action.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о услугах, которые используют люди. Обрати внимание, кто выполняет действие.

content.text: I don't do everything myself! I <highlight>have my hair cut</highlight> at the salon every month. Last week, I <highlight>had my car serviced</highlight> at the garage. I <highlight>got my windows cleaned</highlight> by professionals. Tomorrow, I'm <highlight>having my photo taken</highlight> for a new passport. I <highlight>got my computer fixed</highlight> last week - it was expensive! We're <highlight>having our house painted</highlight> next month. I need to <highlight>get my suit dry-cleaned</highlight> for the wedding. I <highlight>had my eyes tested</highlight> yesterday.
content.question: Does the speaker do these things personally or arrange for someone else to do them?
content.question_ru: Говорящий делает это сам или организует, чтобы кто-то другой это сделал?

theory.title: Causative: Having Services Done By Others

points.example: I had my hair cut. (Someone cut my hair for me)
I got my car fixed. (Someone fixed my car for me)

points.rule: Use: When we arrange for someone else to do something for us
points.rule_ru: Использование: Когда мы организуем, чтобы кто-то другой что-то сделал для нас
points.example: I don't cut my own hair - I have it cut by a hairdresser.

points.rule: All tenses work: have/had/will have/am having + object + V3
points.rule_ru: Все времена работают: have/had/will have/am having + объект + V3
points.example: I'm having my car repaired. I had it repaired. I'll have it repaired.

points.rule: Also used for negative experiences (something happens to you)
points.rule_ru: Также используется для негативного опыта (что-то случается с тобой)
points.example: I had my wallet stolen. She got her phone broken.

comparison_table.meaning: Focus on hair, not who did it

notice.instruction: Find all causative structures. Identify what service was done and when.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все каузативные конструкции. Определи, какая услуга была выполнена и когда.

tasks.text: I'm preparing for my wedding! Yesterday, I had my dress altered to fit perfectly. I'm getting my makeup done by a professional on the day. I've had my invitations printed at a local shop. Next week, I'm having the cake delivered to the venue. My fiancé is getting his suit tailored. We're having our photos taken by a famous photographer. We've already had the venue decorated. Unfortunately, I got my car scratched in the parking lot yesterday - bad timing!

notice.reflection_question: What's the difference between 'I cut my hair' and 'I had my hair cut'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: В чём разница между 'I cut my hair' и 'I had my hair cut'?

sentences.original: A mechanic services my car every year.
sentences.causative: I have/get my car serviced every year.

sentences.original: A photographer took our wedding photos.
sentences.causative: We had/got our wedding photos taken.

sentences.original: Someone will deliver the furniture tomorrow.
sentences.causative: I'll have/get the furniture delivered tomorrow.

sentences.original: A technician is repairing my computer.
Someone cleans our office every day.
sentences.causative: We have/get our office cleaned every day.

sentences.original: A dentist checked my teeth yesterday.
sentences.causative: I had/got my teeth checked yesterday.

exercises.instruction: Complete using the correct form of causative.

sentences.sentence: I need to ___ my suit ___ (dry-clean) before the interview.
She ___ her portrait ___ (paint) by a famous artist last year.
He ___ his car ___ (steal) last night. (negative experience)
She ___ her nails ___ (do) every two weeks.

sentences.incorrect: I had cut my hair yesterday.
sentences.correct: I had my hair cut yesterday.
sentences.explanation: Object goes between 'had' and past participle

sentences.incorrect: She got her car to repair.
We are having painted our house.
sentences.correct: We are having our house painted.

produce.instruction: Write about services you use or plan to use, using causative structures.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши об услугах, которыми ты пользуешься или планируешь воспользоваться, используя каузативные конструкции.
prompts: What services do you regularly have done?
Describe preparations for an event (wedding, party, trip)
Describe a negative experience where something happened to your belongings
produce.example: I'm quite busy, so I use many services. I have my apartment cleaned twice a month by a cleaning company. I get my car washed every week at the local garage. I had my bathroom renovated last year - it was expensive but worth it! Next week, I'm having my air conditioning serviced because summer is coming. I also need to get my passport renewed soon. Unfortunately, I got my phone screen cracked last month and had it replaced. I'm thinking of having my old photos digitized - I have so many memories in boxes!
criteria: Uses have/get + object + past participle correctly
Includes both regular services and one-time events

texts.title: Moving Day
texts.content: Moving house is stressful! We had all our furniture transported by a moving company. We got the utilities connected before we arrived. I had my piano tuned after the move - it was out of tune! We're having the walls repainted next week. I got my address changed at the post office. We had the carpets professionally cleaned. My husband is getting his office set up tomorrow. We even had our pets transported safely!

texts.title: Wedding Preparations
texts.content: Our wedding required so much planning! The bride had her dress custom-made. The groom got his suit tailored perfectly. They had their invitations designed and printed. They're having the venue decorated with flowers. The cake is being made by a famous baker - they're having it delivered on the day. They've had their wedding rings engraved. The photographer is having her equipment checked. Everything will be perfect!

texts.title: Car Troubles
texts.content: My car has been giving me problems! Last month, I had the engine checked. The mechanic found issues, so I got the oil changed and had the brakes replaced. Unfortunately, I also got my window smashed by vandals and had to have it replaced. I'm having the car serviced again next week. I should get the tires rotated too. It's expensive, but I need to have it running smoothly!

texts.title: Home Renovation
texts.content: We're renovating our house! We had the kitchen completely redesigned. We got new cabinets installed last month. The electrician is coming to have the wiring updated. We're having solar panels fitted on the roof. We had the garden landscaped beautifully. Next, we're getting the bathroom modernized. We've had estimates done by several contractors. It's expensive, but we're having our dream home created!

texts.title: Personal Care Routine
texts.content: I take good care of myself! I have my hair cut and colored every six weeks. I get my nails done every two weeks. I had my teeth whitened last year. I'm having a facial done this weekend. I get my eyebrows shaped monthly. I had my eyes tested recently and got new glasses fitted. I even had my ears pierced last month! Self-care is important, and I'm happy to have these services done by professionals.
